name: LAMP Deployment on a single virtual machine - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys Oracle MySQL Database V5.7 and Apache HTTP Server V2.4 on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.displayName: LAMP Deployment on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Oracle MySQL Database V5.7 and Apache HTTP Server V2.4 on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
MySQL DB
odb instance 1, 1 database
Apache HTTP Server

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
Apache HTTP Server Version V2.4, with PHP Module
Oracle MySQL V5.7

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Oracle Database V5.7 - https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/
3. Detailed system requirements for Apache HTTP Server - https://projects.apache.org/project.html?httpd-http_server
